name: marvel-form-automation
description: Automated TypeScript/Playwright tool for submitting Marvel Champions play data to the community statistics Google Form with parallel processing support

scripts.test: npm run build && node dist/submit-forms.js sample_play_data.json 2025-06-01
scripts.test:sequential: npm run build && node dist/submit-forms.js sample_play_data.json 2025-06-01 --sequential
scripts.test:workers: npm run build && node dist/submit-forms.js sample_play_data.json 2025-06-01 --workers 4
